com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.base

Interface DynamicWidget

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DynamicLinkWidget, DynamicProgressWidget, DynamicScrollableWidget, DynamicStateSelectedWidget, DynamicStateWidget, DynamicTextWidget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicAppBarLayout, DynamicBottomNavigationView, DynamicButton, DynamicCardView, DynamicCheckBox, DynamicCheckedTextView, DynamicEditText, DynamicFloatingActionButton, DynamicFrameLayout, DynamicGridView, DynamicHeaderImageView, DynamicHueSeekBar, DynamicImageButton, DynamicImageView, DynamicLinearLayout, DynamicListView, DynamicNavigationView, DynamicNestedGridView, DynamicNestedListView, DynamicNestedScrollView, DynamicPopupBackground, DynamicProgressBar, DynamicRadioButton, DynamicRecyclerView, DynamicScrollView, DynamicSeekBar, DynamicSpinner, DynamicSwipeRefreshLayout, DynamicSwitchCompat, DynamicTabLayout, DynamicTextInputEditText, DynamicTextInputLayout, DynamicTextView, DynamicToolbar, DynamicViewPager

    public interface DynamicWidget
    Interface to create dynamic widgets which can be tinted according to the DynamicTheme.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBackgroundAware()
      Returns the background aware functionality used by this widget.
      int getColor()
      Returns the value of color applied to this widget.
      int getColorType()
      Returns the color type applied to this widget.
      int getContrastWithColor()
      Returns the value of contrast with color applied to this widget.
      int getContrastWithColorType()
      Returns the contrast with color type applied to this widget.
      void initialize()
      Initialize this widget by setting color type.
      boolean isBackgroundAware()
      Checks whether the background aware functionality is enabled.
      void loadFromAttributes(AttributeSet attrs)
      Load values from the supplied attribute set.
      void setBackgroundAware(int backgroundAware)
      Set the value to make this widget background aware or not.
      void setColor()
      Set color of this widget according to the supplied values.
      void setColor(int color)
      Set the value of color for this widget.
      void setColorType(int colorType)
      Set the color type to this widget.
      void setContrastWithColor(int contrastWithColor)
      Set the value of contrast with color for this widget.
      void setContrastWithColorType(int contrastWithColorType)
      Set the contrast with color type to this widget.
      void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Override this method to handle state changes for this widget.

    • Method Detail

      • loadFromAttributes

        void loadFromAttributes(AttributeSet attrs)
        Load values from the supplied attribute set.
        Parameters:
        attrs - The supplied attribute set to load the values.

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Initialize this widget by setting color type. If it is background aware then, background color will also taken into account while setting the color filter.
        See Also:
        Theme.ColorType

      • getColorType

        int getColorType()
        Returns the color type applied to this widget.
        Returns:
        The color type applied to this widget.
        See Also:
        Theme.ColorType

      • setColorType

        void setColorType(int colorType)
        Set the color type to this widget.
        Parameters:
        colorType - The color type for this widget.
        See Also:
        Theme.ColorType

      • getContrastWithColorType

        int getContrastWithColorType()
        Returns the contrast with color type applied to this widget.
        Returns:
        The contrast with color type applied to this widget.
        See Also:
        Theme.ColorType

      • setContrastWithColorType

        void setContrastWithColorType(int contrastWithColorType)
        Set the contrast with color type to this widget.
        Parameters:
        contrastWithColorType - The contrast with color type for this widget.
        See Also:
        Theme.ColorType

      • getColor

        int getColor()
        Returns the value of color applied to this widget.
        Returns:
        The value of color applied to this widget.

      • setColor

        void setColor(int color)
        Set the value of color for this widget.
        Parameters:
        color - Color for this widget.

      • getContrastWithColor

        int getContrastWithColor()
        Returns the value of contrast with color applied to this widget.
        Returns:
        The value of contrast with color applied to this widget.

      • setContrastWithColor

        void setContrastWithColor(int contrastWithColor)
        Set the value of contrast with color for this widget.
        Parameters:
        contrastWithColor - Contrast with color for this widget.

      • getBackgroundAware

        int getBackgroundAware()
        Returns the background aware functionality used by this widget.
        Returns:
        The background aware functionality used by this widget.

      • setBackgroundAware

        void setBackgroundAware(int backgroundAware)
        Set the value to make this widget background aware or not.
        Parameters:
        backgroundAware - The background aware functionality to be set.

      • isBackgroundAware

        boolean isBackgroundAware()
        Checks whether the background aware functionality is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if this widget changes color according to the background.

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Override this method to handle state changes for this widget.

        For example, change alpha according to the enabled or disabled state of this widget.

        Parameters:
        enabled - true if this widget is enabled and can receive click events.

      • setColor

        void setColor()
        Set color of this widget according to the supplied values.
